com.cloudbees.hudson.plugins.modeling.im.description: Creates a Continuous Integration Environment (Development Branch)

template-attribute.name: vs
template-attribute.helpHtml:
Provide the name of the SVM where the CI volume will be created.
SVM names can be listed by using the "List SVM and Aggregates (NetApp)" step.

template-attribute.name: ag
template-attribute.helpHtml:
Provide the name of the Aggregate.
Aggregate names can be listed by using the "List SVM and Aggregates (NetApp)" step.

template-attribute.name: bpname
template-attribute.helpHtml:
Provide the CI Development Branch Name.
It must start with "netappdvp_".
Example: netappdvp_ci_1

template-attribute.name: size
template-attribute.displayName: Volume Size of New CI Development Branch (in MB)
template-attribute.helpHtml:
Provide the Volume Size of New CI Development Branch (in MB)
Example: 512000

com.cloudbees.hudson.plugins.modeling.im.help: This step will create a Continuous Integration Environment , that will contain the source code along with the tools, compilers and rpms that might be necessary to build the code.
